title: Madi's First Week at School: It's fun to learn the days of the week in English and Spanish
description: Do you remember learning to talk when you were a little kid? Did it feel painful or forced? Of course not! It was as natural as learning your colors. Spanish Missy is a fun e-book series designed to teach your kids language the natural way. Let Spanish Missy help you teach your kids their colors, days of the weeks, numbers and more not just in English, but in Spanish at the same time. It's as easy as Monday/lunes, Tuesday/martes, Wednesday/mi√©rcoles!  Madi's First Week of School is a fun, simple and natural way to teach children their days of the week in both English and Spanish at the same time! This e-book includes interactive questions so as to encourage your children to express themselves in both English and Spanish, which is an essential part in raising bilingual children!
author: Spanish Missy
